1: Xukuje' wa' e u tijonic tak ri Salomon ri xek'axex cumal winak ri e c'o che u patanixic ri Ezequiy rajawinel ri Juda:
2: U juluwem ri Dios wa' chi e c'o rawatalic, yabal c'u qui k'ij ri ajawinelab qui ch'obic wa' aretak quecuin che qui ch'obic.
3: Ri u chicajil ri caj, ri u najil u pam ri ulew xukuje' ri qui chomanic tak ri ajawinelab man e ya'tal ta qui ch'obic wa'.
4: Chebatasa' ri tz'ilol che ri sak puak, ri ch'ayal sak puak cuban c'u na jun kumubal;
5: chatasa' chquixo'l ri pataninel tak rech ri ajawinel ri banal etzelal, cäjeki' c'u na ri u tem re ajawibal pa ri suq'uil.
6: Maban awib chi nim a banic chuwäch ri ajawinel, mawi mamajij ri qui c'olbal ri winak ri nimak qui banic;
7: are' nim na u banic chi catulax che pakalem chi' catmach'irisax chquiwäch ri nimak tak tatayib. Ri cawil cuc' ri e a bak'wäch:
8: mebac'am bic pa tak ri k'atbal tzij, we ne c'o chic jun k'alajisanel ri cäcuinic cubij chi man kastzij taj ri cabij chuq'uisbalil c'ut man cach'ob ta chic jas cabano.
9: Chato' awib pa u k'ab ri cattzujunic mawesaj c'u u tzijol ri awatal rumal ri a jil a tz'akat.
10: We c'u ne c'o jachin cattowic catuya' c'u pa q'uixbal, are c'u ri yok'bal ri cacanaj chawij man c'o ta a to'tajic chupam.
11: Jun tzij pa ri jok'otaj ri rajawaxic xak junam ruc' jun mansa'n re k'an puak ri nac'om chupam sak puak.
12: Jacha' jun mulk'ab xukuje' jun chachal re k'an puak ri coc' na, are je cuban wa' ri aj no'jalaj k'iloj ib che ri reta'm u c'amowaxic.
13: Ri jicalaj tako'n che ri cätakow bic xak junam ruc' ri tew ri cajorjobisan pa ri k'ij aretak c'o k'ak', cuya' c'u chajin anima' che ri rajaw.
14: E sutz' xukuje' ri quiakik' man c'o ta c'u jäb, jewa' ri ri winak ri cubij rib chi yanel man c'o ta c'u ri ya'tal ta rumal.
15: Ri coch'onic cukasaj ri oyowal; ri ch'uch'ujalaj tak tzij cäquipaxij ri c'ulelanic.
16: We cärik juyubal räx cab, chatija' ri takalic ri catijo'; we c'u ne rumal roc'owisaxic u wi' ri catijo catxawic.
17: We casolij ri awachil, xak amak'el mabano, mäq'uistaj c'u ne u c'u'x chawe itzel ta chi c'u ne catrilo.
18: Wi't, ch'ich' re ch'o'j, ch'ab ri tz'imaj u wi', ¡are jewa' ri cuya' jalum k'alajisanic chrij ri rachil ri junam u wäch ruc'!
19: U jiquibaxic c'uxaj chrij jun jachanel quieb u wäch pa tak ri jok'otaj re c'axc'olil xak junam ri' ruc' ri binem ruc' jun a'aj k'ajinak, o wa'im ruc' jun wareaj ri snoc'.
20: Qui bixoxic bix che jun anima'aj ri ch'ibatajinak xak junam ri' ruc' ri u q'uiakic ch'am chuwäch ri ch'a'c, o ri u k'olixic ri atz'iak pa ri k'ijol rech tew.
21: We ri a c'ulel canumic, chaya' ri cutijo; we c'u ne cachak'ij u chi' chaya' ri caruq'uiaj;
22: jeri' caban na chi cäk'ak'an ri u palaj che q'uixbal, ri Ajawaxel c'ut cätojow na chawe.
23: Rumal ri quiakik' aj riquiak'ab elebal k'ij cäpe ri jäb, cumal c'ut ri itzel tak ak'aj ri itzel tak palaj.
24: Are utz na ri c'olem chuchi' ri u wi' ri ja, che u q'uexwäch ri c'olem pa jun nimalaj ja ruc' jun ixok ri xuwi ch'o'j cupatanij.
25: Jacha' ri ja' ri cäjororic chupam ri chaki'j kulaj ri cachaki'j u chi' jewa' cuban ri qui kajic utzalaj tak tzijol ri petinak pa naj tak ulew.
26: U q'uiyibal ja' xk'olatajinak xukuje' puk'talic are jeri' man c'o ta u mac ri cäbirbitic chuwäch ri ajchak'mac.
27: Man utz ta cubano we coc'ow u wi' u tijic juyubal räx cab, xukuje man utz taj cunimarisaj rib jun.
28: Jacha' jun tinimit ri man kasan ta pa nimalaj tapia ri xak tek'elic jeri' ri man reta'm taj catakan taj paquiwi' ri e u rayibal.
